column3:
Heavy, toughened leather masks  stuffed with sweet herbs to filter the air and counter evil miasmas.  They offer a good degree of protection to the face and head without weighing the wearer down. Special Rules:
‚óè Avoid stun: A model that is equipped with a plague mask has a special 5+ save against being stunned.  If the save is successful, treat the stunned result as knocked down instead.  This save is not modified by the opponent's strength, etc.
